ns2:test-suite.name: my.company.ScreenshotTest
ns2:test-suite.title: Search tests
ns2:test-suite.description: This testsuite has tests what always are passing

failure.message: AssertionError: Text on current page should be correct Expected: element text is "Yandex" but: <[[PhantomJSDriver: phantomjs on LINUX (51b88fa0-8ffb-11e3-b08a-0f43623324f4)] -> css selector: title]> text is ""
